refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: In the syntax summary of a constructorsynopsis, destructorsynopsis, or methodsynopsis, methodparam provides the description of a parameter to the method. Typically, this includes the data type of the parameter and its name, but may also include an initial value and other modifiers.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: For a complete description of the processing expectations, see classsynopsis.
